name: Automated Messaging and Urgent Notification System
description: This pattern automates the handling and response to messages received by a customer advisory team using MS Teams. It filters messages to detect urgency or sender-based prioritization, triggering automatic responses for standard inquiries and sending email alerts to the advisor for urgent matters or messages from the boss.
tech_stack: Rasa or Simple Transformers for NLP
llm_recommended_approach: Utilize Microsoft Graph API for accessing messages in MS Teams. Implement an NLP model to classify standard messages from critical or prioritized ones. Automatically respond to common inquiries and use SMTP to trigger email notifications for prioritized messages.
